npcs.name: Selune Vaeloria
npcs.description: Selune wears medium straight blonde hair with crimson eyes; fair smooth skin and medium height and a athletic build complete the impression. She moves like a deer about to bolt, then turns and plants both feet like a tree — voice low, bowstring singing, eyes bright with the kind of faith that only breaks when it must. Physique and style reflect her forest elf heritage: Tall, slender — bronze to olive skin — leaf-dyed hair and floral tattoos — bright woodland eyes and effortless stealth. She has medium, straight, blonde hair — crimson eyes — fair, smooth skin — medium height, athletic build. She has pointed ears. She is calm, observant, quietly determined. She believes in mercy, but her aim is quicker — her laughter is soft and warm and gone the second trouble creaks in the brush. Her questions are sharp, and when she smiles after, it’s half relief, half dare. She wears quiet leathers, leaf-dyed cloak, soft boots, beadwork and feather charms. She wears supple leaf-dyed leathers with bark-plate reinforcements, a hood drawn low and soft boots for silent steps.

npcs.name: Elara Thornfield
npcs.description: She is witty, charming, quick on the turn. Green-eyed tracker with wind-burned cheeks and a freckled smile; oilskin cloak, rope-lashed bedroll, and a knife that never quite leaves her palm. Of medium height and a slim build, she shows green eyes, medium straight brown hair, freckled smooth skin. She speaks sparingly, tends fires like she’s mending people, and watches for trouble the way other folks watch sunsets. When she laughs, it shows teeth; when she fights, it shows history. Physique and style reflect her human heritage: adaptable, varied, pragmatic layers and well-worn gear, with a traveler’s economy of movement. She has . She wears layered travel-wear, weathered cloak, belt pouches, sturdy boots. She wears a travel-worn cloak over layered leathers, hood up and boots dusted from the road.

npcs.name: Jorah Skylark
npcs.description: He is witty, charming, quick on the turn. Fiddler’s hands and a duelist’s posture — neat boots, bright smile, and a habit of talking doors open before knocking. He cuts a slim figure at medium height — medium straight black hair, blue eyes, fair smooth skin. He has medium, straight, black hair — blue eyes — fair, smooth skin — medium height, slim build. He hums when he’s lying and sings when he’s scared — carries luck like a coin between finger and thumb. When the blade comes out, the charm turns to quiet—one breath, one step, one line cut. He has . She wears layered travel-wear, weathered cloak, belt pouches, sturdy boots. He wears linen shirt and waistcoat under a stormcloak, high boots and a brace of knives at the small of the back.

npcs.name: Kess Starcrest
npcs.description: She is composed, purposeful, sharp when it counts. With medium straight ash hair and gold eyes and ashen smooth skin, she stands at medium height with slim build. Physique and style reflect her great elf heritage: tall, fine-boned, luminous poise; high fashion with metallic accents; eyes like sunlit metal. She has medium, straight, ash hair; gold eyes; ashen, smooth skin; medium height, slim build. She has pointed ears. Every gesture is a measured stanza; every spell, a verse with perfect meter. She keeps secrets folded like origami and unfolds her only when the table is hers. She wears high court robes with metallic trim, jeweled clasps, silk gloves, polished boots. She wears a patched apron and simple workshirt, rolled sleeves and heavy boots—artisan’s garb in place of finery.

npcs.name: Vael Ironvale
npcs.description: He is witty, charming, quick on the turn. He has ruddy rough skin · brown eyes · medium braided black hair · medium height and a bulky build. He has medium, braided, black hair — brown eyes — ruddy, rough skin — medium height, bulky build. He wears stout mail over quilted gambeson with plate at shoulders and shins, a broad belt of hammered brass. Forge-warden with gravel in his laugh and coal in his beard — carries a hammer that knows names and a ledger that remembers debts. He drinks to bargains, not to victories, and sharpens his friends the way he sharpens steel—steady, hot, and honest. He has . She wears forge leathers, iron-banded bracers, tool belt, hobnail boots.

npcs.name: Liora Stormbind
npcs.description: She is patient with strangers and tender with clouds — impatient only with tyrants. She is composed, purposeful, sharp when it counts. All olive smooth skin and blue eyes, she carries a slim build at medium height; medium wavy black hair. She has medium, wavy, black hair — blue eyes — olive, smooth skin — medium height, slim build. She has pointed ears. Weather-witch with stormlight in her pupils and thorn-ink curling her wrists — cloak hem stitched with dried leaves that whisper when she moves. She wears quiet leathers, leaf-dyed cloak, soft boots, beadwork and feather charms. She wears a flowing saffron robe belted with braided cord, soft doeskin shoes and a travel-cloak pinned with a moon-brooch.

npcs.name: Kael Ashvale
npcs.description: Kael has amber eyes; medium straight silver hair; pale smooth skin; medium height and a slim build. He has medium, straight, silver hair; amber eyes; pale, smooth skin; medium height, slim build. He has fox ears, tail. He is calm, observant, quietly determined. He barters information for favors and favors for stories, then returns both with interest. Physique and style reflect his kitsune heritage: vulpine grace, quick fingers, lacquered charms and layered silks scented with citrus and smoke. She wears layered silks, lacquered charms, soft-soled shoes, mask cord. He wears a doublet and riding breeches with knee boots, gloves tucked through the belt.

npcs.name: Iria Brightbough
npcs.description: She is calm, observant, quietly determined. Medium straight blonde hair, amber eyes, fair smooth skin; she is medium height and a willowy build. Light-touched herbalist who hums to plants until she listen; bright laugh, gentle hands, and a satchel full of green solutions to red problems. She believes tea is a treaty and honey a weapon. Physique and style reflect her sylvari heritage: bark-soft leathers, leaf-stitched patterns, a living-vine bracelet that tightens when she lies. She has . She wears layered travel-wear, weathered cloak, belt pouches, sturdy boots. She wears steel plate over mail with a faded tabard, leather gloves and a sword belt worn smooth.

npcs.name: Thalen Thornfield
npcs.description: He is calm, observant, quietly determined. All fair smooth skin and brown eyes, he carries a slim build at medium height; medium straight brown hair. He has medium, straight, brown hair — brown eyes — fair, smooth skin — medium height, slim build. He has fox ears, tail. Scout with a grin that signs contracts his legs can cash — twirls a ring like a coin, tests every door twice, and never quite looks where he’s going—because he already looked. She wears layered silks, lacquered charms, soft-soled shoes, mask cord. He wears linen shirt and waistcoat under a stormcloak, high boots and a brace of knives at the small of the back.

npcs.name: Kess Vaeloria
npcs.description: Kess wears medium braided white hair with silver eyes; pale smooth skin and medium height and a graceful build complete the impression. She has medium, braided, white hair; silver eyes; pale, smooth skin; medium height, graceful build. She is composed, purposeful, sharp when it counts. Sky-chantress with a feathered mantle and a voice that finds the note in bone; missions travel faster when her song goes ahead of you. She gifts maps in measures and measures in flight paths. She has wings, talons. She wears feathered mantle, flight leathers, beadwork, talon guards. She wears steel plate over mail with a faded tabard, leather gloves and a sword belt worn smooth.

npcs.name: Syl Blackfen
npcs.description: She is witty, charming, quick on the turn. Shield-sister with a voice like a drum and a smile like a drawn blade; her promises are few and her follow-through absolute. Syl has medium straight none hair, medium height and a bulky build, coal-scaled scaled skin, amber eyes. She has medium, straight, none hair; amber eyes; coal-scaled, scaled skin; medium height, bulky build. She has horns, tail, scales. She keeps a polished mirror for her crest and a list of names for her fire. She wears scale-fitted mail, crest polish, heavy cloak cut for tail. She wears a doublet and riding breeches with knee boots, gloves tucked through the belt.

npcs.name: Thalen Mistbrook
npcs.description: He is composed, purposeful, sharp when it counts. Physique and style reflect his dragonborn heritage: plated scales, heavy shoulders, crest-polish ritual and a braided cord of service. He is of medium height and a bulky build — long braided none hair · green eyes · bronze-scaled scaled skin. He has horns, tail, scales. River-watch veteran with the patience of rock and the humor of rain — writes short letters home and longer ones he never sends. When he fights, he moves like a door closing—clean, final, inevitable. She wears scale-fitted mail, crest polish, heavy cloak cut for tail. He wears a doublet and riding breeches with knee boots, gloves tucked through the belt.

npcs.name: Rowan Skylark
npcs.description: He is witty, charming, quick on the turn. With medium straight brown hair and brown eyes and tan smooth skin, he stands at short height with compact build. White-haired minstrel with a travel-stained coat and boots that could tell his own stories — sings like he’s bargaining with fate and smiles like he already lost once. Courage comes late for him—but it arrives in full measure. Physique and style reflect his human heritage: compact strength, roadworthy leathers, instrument always close. He has . She wears layered travel-wear, weathered cloak, belt pouches, sturdy boots. He wears steel plate over mail with a faded tabard, leather gloves and a sword belt worn smooth.

npcs.name: Liora Ironvale
npcs.description: Of medium height and a athletic build, she shows copper eyes, medium straight none hair, iron-grey scales scaled skin. She has horns, tail, scales. She is composed, purposeful, sharp when it counts. Mercenary-captain who calls her crew family and her enemies lessons — wears a coin on a chain for every comrade kept alive. Physique and style reflect her dragonborn heritage: iron-toned scales, disciplined stance, gear maintained to parade shine. She wears scale-fitted mail, crest polish, heavy cloak cut for tail. She wears a doublet and riding breeches with knee boots, gloves tucked through the belt.

npcs.name: Serenya Mistbrook
npcs.description: Of medium height and a slim build, she shows blue eyes, medium straight brown hair, fair smooth skin. She is calm, observant, quietly determined. Peacemaker with a gardener’s patience and a diplomat’s trowel; she weeds grudges and waters trust. Her pockets hold seeds, salves, and second chances. Physique and style reflect her sylvari heritage: leaf embroidery, petal-soft sleeves, a wristlet that flowers when truth is spoken. She has . She wears layered travel-wear, weathered cloak, belt pouches, sturdy boots. She wears a doublet and riding breeches with knee boots, gloves tucked through the belt.

npcs.name: Rowan Blackfen
npcs.description: He is composed, purposeful, sharp when it counts. He has amber eyes · medium height and a bulky build · dark scales scaled skin · medium straight none hair. He has horns, tail, scales. Caravan bulwark, all patience until the trouble starts — then he becomes a moving wall with a very convincing argument. He drinks tea like a priest and fights like a cart rolling downhill. Physique and style reflect his dragonborn heritage: heavy plating, ritual scars burnished with oil, a cloak cut to clear the tail. She wears scale-fitted mail, crest polish, heavy cloak cut for tail. He wears steel plate over mail with a faded tabard, leather gloves and a sword belt worn smooth.

npcs.name: Sable Brightbough
npcs.description: She is calm, observant, quietly determined. Olive smooth skin and hazel eyes frame her face; long straight black hair. She has long, straight, black hair — hazel eyes — olive, smooth skin — medium height, slim build. She has pointed ears. Pathfinder with the patience of moss and the appetite of a campfire — maps in her head, songs in her pocket, kindness where people don’t expect it. She wears quiet leathers, leaf-dyed cloak, soft boots, beadwork and feather charms. npcs.name: Lyra Skylark

Earth-touched caravan guard with stone-bloom tattoos and a gentler voice than her size suggests — lifts wagons and morale in equal measure. She spars like a cliffside—immovable until it moves, then catastrophic. She has . She wears stone-dyed leathers, corded cloak, bone clasps, heavy sandals. She wears a travel-worn cloak over layered leathers, hood up and boots dusted from the road.

npcs.name: Mira Duskwind
npcs.description: She is witty, charming, quick on the turn. Night-runner with a smile you notice a minute too late — deals in messages, counter-messages, and the silences between her. Mira has medium straight black hair · violet eyes · medium height and a slim build · pale smooth skin. She has medium, straight, black hair — violet eyes — pale, smooth skin — medium height, slim build. She keeps her promises like knives—hidden, sharp, exactly where she left her. She has . She wears layered travel-wear, weathered cloak, belt pouches, sturdy boots. She wears a flowing saffron robe belted with braided cord, soft doeskin shoes and a travel-cloak pinned with a moon-brooch.

npcs.name: Garrin Stonewake
npcs.description: He is composed, purposeful, sharp when it counts. He is of medium height and a bulky build — medium straight brown hair · hazel eyes · tan smooth skin. River-guard turned road-warden; cloak patched, boots mended, heart still unbroken. He knows the names of crossings, the moods of bridges, and which ferrymen lie. He treats promises like oaths and oaths like anchors—heavy, necessary, trusted. Physique and style reflect his human heritage: broad-shouldered endurance, layered travel-wear, hands callused from rope and oar. He has . She wears layered travel-wear, weathered cloak, belt pouches, sturdy boots. He wears steel plate over mail with a faded tabard, leather gloves and a sword belt worn smooth.

npcs.name: Razan Stormhand
npcs.description: With medium braided black braids hair and ice blue eyes and slate-green smooth skin, he stands at very tall height with bulky build. She wears a flowing embroidered robe and sleeveless overcloak, a vine belt with pouches, leaf-stitched bracers, a long skirt with slits and strapped sandals.. She wears flowing embroidered robe, sleeveless overcloak, vine belt with pouches, leaf-stitched bracers, long skirt with slits, strapped sandals. Physique and style reflect her avianfolk heritage: light bones, keen motion-sense, feather braids threaded with sky-colored beads. She has wings, talons.
